Entries.default: "Well, well, if it isn't Harker's new business partner. That's quite a lot of coin you two exchanged."

"Right. We all know Harker's been itching to come out of retirement and claim a bigger slice of Dunnage for himself.

"Eying a seat on the Council, I bet he is."

"Everyone knows Harker's aiming to come out of retirement and slice off a bigger part of Dunnage for himself. Maybe he even wants to steal a seat on the Council! 

"We can't be letting someone of your reputation back him, now can we?"
"Think I'll send him your head as a reminder to stick to selling grog and flea-infested beds."
[Lie] "Who? Never heard of this Harker you're talking about."

"Don't bother lying - several of my men saw you at the King's Coffin. Looks like Harker's hiring new muscle and coming out of retirement.

"And I can't be having that, now can I?"
"D-d-dead?! The Red King?!" The pirate sputters, caught off guard.

"No... wait a tick. This is another one of his ploys, ain't it? Aye, that it must be. And I don't like being deceived."

Light gleams from a gold tooth when he sneers.
